attributes.action: put "Re-Open Nominations" as an option in the next general election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are tired of politicans who are using tax payers' money to fund second homes and abusing the expenses system. We believe that these are not good people to represent us. 

We want the opportunity at the next general election to choose NONE of the candidates. Consequently - new candidates with better morals can be found if the constituents so vote.

So - we want RON (re-open nominations) to be a valid choice on all ballot papers at the next general election.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with the electoral commission http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
